}} 'City Hall' is the headquarters of the Greater London Authority (GLA) which
comprises the Mayor of London and the London Assembly. It is located in
Southwark, on the south bank of the River Thames near Tower Bridge. It was
designed by Norman Foster and opened in July 2002, two years after the Greater
London Authority was created.
categories: City and town halls in London|London
